Chapter 7 Trustee's Report of No Distribution: I, James J Joseph, having been appointed trustee of the estate of the above-named debtor(s), report that I have neither received any property nor paid any money on account of this estate; that I have made a diligent inquiry into the financial affairs of the debtor(s) and the location of the property belonging to the estate; and that there is no property available for distribution from the estate over and above that exempted by law. Pursuant to Fed R Bank P 5009, I hereby certify that the estate of the above-named debtor(s) has been fully administered. I request that I be discharged from any further duties as trustee. Key information about this case as reported in schedules filed by the debtor(s) or otherwise found in the case record: This case was pending for 2 months. Assets Abandoned: $ 125.00, Assets Exempt: $ 733720.00, Claims Scheduled: $ 1081701.00, Claims Asserted: Not Applicable, Claims scheduled to be discharged without payment: $ 1081701.00. Filed by Trustee James J Joseph (RE: related document(s) 4 Meeting of Creditors with 341). (Joseph, James) (Entered: 07/06/2009)
